name: add_penalty
attributes: # [doc = " 管理者がユーザーにペナルティを課す機能（前提：既存のペナルティレコードあり）"]
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . admin . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;
let rec = & mut ctx . accounts . record ;
msg ! ("Penalty {}pts added to {} (now {})." , points , rec . user , rec . penalty) ;

name: pay_penalty
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーがペナルティを支払って復活する機能"]
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . user . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;
let rec = & mut ctx . accounts . record ;
msg ! ("Penalty cleared for {}. Account reactivated." , rec . user) ;
